scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Creditworthiness Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data, specifically income levels, from a publicly accessible creditworthiness prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to circumvent privacy safeguards and utilize the reconstructed data for fraudulent purposes.
initial_goal: Infer customer income levels from the publicly available creditworthiness prediction API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A fintech company provides a creditworthiness prediction API based on a machine learning model trained on anonymized customer data.  The API is publicly accessible for authorized developers with rate limits in place.
